name: Curling Extreme
description:
This game, Curling Extreme, was a project I made in my college programming class. Unlike all my other projects in classes, I'm actually quite proud of this one. It probably will break on you, but that's what I get for writing a collision system myself. That's it, very small game. 

Party mode is the only mode to play.

This game is one featured on my portfolio website.

http://elijahcobb.net
